Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Had a kid's birthday party there. Unfortunately the outside playground was mostly closed off still. There was a mistake with the booking, the starting time was registered wrongly, but the manager managed to call all personnel in the early morning and it could start only 30 mins too late. Good service

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: For a children cafe, it is amazing how unfriendly the staff can be. The whole idea is that the kids would be enabled to make their own food, but they could at least make the children feel welcome by giving them basic instructions as to what â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Not what I expected.  Went for mommy daughters day to decorate cupcakes.  You get a ready made cupcake, choice of white or pink sugary paste and 5 ingredients same for everyone.  Very low quality.  My girls ages 5 and 7 were done in about 2 â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Nice location and playground but the service is not great. Limited menu with no food options for lactose/dairy and meat free eaters (you can also not eat your own food there) as everything has cheese or meat. â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text:
Nice location at the Vondelpark, near Overtoom. Reachable by tram or by bike. Car parking underneath Reade, center for rehabilitation.
Good idea, nice for kids parties, but if would be great if the kids could learn â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: This translates to Kids Cook Cafe. For about 2-3euros, you can decorate your own cupcake, sandwiches, or make your own carrot/cucumber puzzle, pigs'n a blanket, or roll out and cut your own butter cookies. For the baked stuff, you make it, â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Brilliant idea and lots of fun for kids. If you are looking for a place to have a coffee or tea while your kids can play, this is it. Also great for birthday parties or play dates. Great place to warmup after a walk in a cold winter day with your kids.

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: A brilliant and unique experience for parents and younger kids/pre-teens. We were welcomed by the friendly and helpful Sandra and her young volunteer who walked us through the process: kids choose the dish they would like to prepare from a â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: This is a very nice place in a little corner on the Vondelpark. Good for little kids and bigger kids. We didn't find the staff there particularly engaging, seemed too busy amongst themselves to be bothered about customers. It's a trust â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Very nice place for kids. Fun with cooking! They can choose from a selection of dishes, Warm food (like pizza), pastries, etc. Just for 10 minutes or up to say half an hour to keep your little ones busy. Pizzas will be heated and served! â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: The concept is fabulous, but the execution was lacking.  Perhaps I was there on a bad day, but I expected my kids to feel totally welcome there.  Instead, my wife and I were both shocked how distant and unwelcome we felt.  No one greated â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Kids enjoyed preparing their own food (2 year old and 6 year old) . Nice idea for a cafe, with some fun play areas whilst you wait for the food to cook. Good parking for bikes. The idea needs a bit of refining to improve the experience.

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Great place for kids to hang out. There are several menu items they can make and a nice small play area outside. The staff was friendly and made sure we have every thing we needed. Had great fun, good food we made on our own, and a reasonable price

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: I got to spend the morning here with my niece and nephew and they had a lot of fun. It is a great place for parents to drop their child by for a sing-a-long event or just to make something (pizza, cookies, etc.) with their children. Very close to Vondelpark, so if the sun is out you can go for a nice walk afterwards.

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: there are some stairs to get in bit kids can also take the slide. We had a Birthday party celebration full of sugar and chocolate! Bake with your friends your own chocolate cake, Oatmeal cocobars and decorating spice bread houses... Magic â€¦

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Good place for kids 2-6 years. They can make themselves cookies or pizza or just decorate a cupcake. Place has also lots of toys and books. Perfect for rainy days

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Great place too entertain your kids while making food. They have classes too. Also great option to just chill out with coffee while your kids play, although the coffee is not that great (nespresso).

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: A very nice activity place for children who can prepare their own food. Mostly suitable for the little ones, up until 8 or so..

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Great for children, with do it yourself pizzas and cookies. A little bit disorganised but children liked it with the play area in the garden.

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Super friendly staff, relaxed atmosphere and simply a great idea if you're looking to combine eating with keeping the kids occupied

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: My kids had a lot of fun making food together and playing. It was a great experience.

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Nice learning and fun experience for the kids. Kids learn to cook (assist), to serve and to clean.

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Great cafe for kids with cookie making sessions a good activity for young kids. Good location beside Vondelpark

Name: Kinderkookkafe
Review Text: Fun for kids but torture for nutrition minded parents! Really low quality ingredients.
